attributes.additional_details:
Their are many 16 year olds who get tattoos done illegally and by their friends, which is wrong, I think the law of people getting tattooed 18+ is too old.
I agree it might be a health and safety reason, but 16 year olds get treated like adults sometimes, they have to pay train and bus fares as adults and get charged as an adult in cinema's, theme parks etc. Also can get piercings alone at 16, and honestly, i believe piercings are worse than tattoos. Do you want your child getting ill by a bad needle? No, try and help legalise tattoos at 16!
